Race.SpecificTitle: PW-Law Enforcement Dist. -- 5.98 Mills - Sheriff - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Law Enforcement District Proposition
(Tax Continuation)

Summary: 10 year, 5.98 mills property tax continuation for providing additional funding
for the District.
Race.FullText:
Shall the Law Enforcement District of the Parish of Beauregard, State of Louisiana (the
"District"), be authorized to continue to levy a five and ninety-eight hundredths (5.98)
mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of
said tax for one entire year being $1,087,905) on all the property subject to taxation in
the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with
the year 2019, for the purpose of providing additional funding for the District
